title: List
name: List
description: This endpoint should be used to retrieve a list of available recipes. The recipes can be filtered using the below query parameters. If no query parameters are provided, all available recipes will be returned in the response object.

Parameter.description: A stringified JSON object. Each property is a key-value pair where the key represents the recipe property, e.g. "ingredients", and the value represents the filter to be applied to the list of recipes, e.g. "Lemon"

examples.title: malformedJson (500):

groupDescription: Used by clients to retrieve recipe data
